text:
RELIGION

Panchadasi: Satyavratananda Saraswati, Mylapore Club, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 11 a.m.

Panduranga Mahimai: Navalpakkam Narasimhan, Sheeradi Saibaba Temple, 16th St., Thillaiganga Nagar, Nanganallur, 6.30 p.m.

Thayumanavar: P. Venkatesan, Kothandamar Temple, Old Washermenpet, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Alliance Francaise of Madras: Screening of film ‘Brooklyn’, College Rd., Nungambakkam, 4.30 p.m. and 7 p.m.

International Society for Laya Awareness: Kumbhodbhavam – a unique Ghatamphony concert with 50 ghatams, Sri Krishna Gana Sabha, T. Nagar, 7 p.m.

GENERAL

Department of Indian History – University of Madras: Shri Justice P Rajagopalan endowment lecture on ‘The Constitution of India Forty Second Amendment: An Appraisal’, Tower Clock Building, Chepauk, 10.30 a.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, Divine School, Perumal Koil St., Pudur; CSI Inbarasu Aalayam, Tollgate; Puthiya Shakthi Group, Ezhil Nagar 3rd St., Kodungaiyur; Santhome Boys HSS., Santhome; and Philomina MHSS., Injambakkam, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Church of Christ, Anna Nagar; Chennai School, Arunachalam St., Chintadripet; Victory Child Development Centre, Muthalamman Koil St., Selaiyur; Church of Victorious Cross, Jawaharlal Nehru Salai, Ashok Nagar; St. Joseph Church, Cholapuram Rd., Ambattur; St. Sebastian Church, Madhavaram; Ganapathy Sachidananda Ashram Hospital, Baby Nagar, Velachery; C.S.I. Church, Thiruvottiyur; and Christ Church, Porur, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
